The two definitions of SN are equivalent for lex. \begin{coqdoccode}
\coqdocnoindent
\coqdockw{Lemma} \coqdef{Lambda Ex.SN equivSN alt}{SN\_equivSN\_alt}{\coqdoclemma{SN\_equivSN\_alt}}: \coqdockw{\ensuremath{\forall}} \coqdocvar{t}, \coqdocdefinition{SN} \coqref{Lambda Ex.lex}{\coqdocdefinition{lex}} \coqdocvariable{t} \coqexternalref{:type scope:x '<->' x}{http://coq.inria.fr/distrib/8.4pl4/stdlib/Coq.Init.Logic}{\coqdocnotation{\ensuremath{\leftrightarrow}}} \coqdocinductive{SN\_alt} \coqref{Lambda Ex.lex}{\coqdocdefinition{lex}} \coqdocvariable{t}.\coqdoceol
\coqdocnoindent
\coqdockw{Proof}. \coqdocvar{Admitted}.\coqdoceol
\coqdocemptyline
\end{coqdoccode}
